question: Analyze the technology adoption trends among companies in the IT industry.

subtasks.task: Identify companies classified under the IT industry and collect their core data including their IT budget and strength.
Gather details of the technologies used by the identified IT companies to understand their adoption patterns.
Assess the strategic technology focus areas of the identified IT companies to analyze innovative trends and initiatives in technology adoption.
Compile hiring trends within these companies to correlate skill demands with technology adoption trends.
Analyze social media metrics of the identified IT companies for additional insights into their engagement with new technologies and market trends.
